description: This file provides wrapper functions for memory allocation routines (malloc, free, realloc, calloc, strdup) that include tracking information such as file and line number, conditional on the USE_SYSRES_MLT macro. It references external memory management functions and handles different calling contexts with __builtin_return_address. The code is specific to resource monitoring and debugging within a system.

methods.name: void * rpl_malloc0(unsigned int size,const char * file,int line)
methods.description: Allocates memory with tracking info, using caller context __builtin_return_address(0).

methods.name: void * rpl_malloc1(unsigned int size,const char * file,int line)
methods.description: Allocates memory with tracking info, using caller context __builtin_return_address(1).

methods.name: void rpl_free0(void * p,const char * file,int line)
methods.description: Frees memory with tracking info, using caller context __builtin_return_address(0).

methods.name: void rpl_free1(void * p,const char * file,int line)
methods.description: Frees memory with tracking info, using caller context __builtin_return_address(1).

methods.name: void * rpl_realloc0(void * p,unsigned int size,const char * file,int line)
methods.description: Reallocates memory with tracking info, using caller context __builtin_return_address(0).

methods.name: void * rpl_realloc1(void * p,unsigned int size,const char * file,int line)
methods.description: Reallocates memory with tracking info, using caller context __builtin_return_address(1).

methods.name: void * rpl_calloc0(unsigned int num,unsigned int size,const char * file,int line)
methods.description: Allocates zero-initialized memory with tracking info, using caller context __builtin_return_address(0).

methods.name: void * rpl_calloc1(unsigned int num,unsigned int size,const char * file,int line)
methods.description: Allocates zero-initialized memory with tracking info, using caller context __builtin_return_address(1).

methods.name: char * rpl_strdup(const char * str,const char * file,int line)
methods.description: Duplicates a string with tracking info, using caller context __builtin_return_address(0).

ctags.name: rpl_calloc0
ctags.pattern: /^void * rpl_calloc0 (unsigned int num, unsigned int size, const char *file, int line)$/
ctags.signature: (unsigned int num,unsigned int size,const char * file,int line)

ctags.name: rpl_calloc1
ctags.pattern: /^void * rpl_calloc1 (unsigned int num, unsigned int size, const char *file, int line)$/
ctags.signature: (unsigned int num,unsigned int size,const char * file,int line)

ctags.name: rpl_malloc0
ctags.pattern: /^void * rpl_malloc0 (unsigned int size, const char *file, int line)$/

ctags.name: rpl_malloc1
ctags.pattern: /^void * rpl_malloc1 (unsigned int size, const char *file, int line)$/

ctags.name: rpl_realloc0
ctags.pattern: /^void * rpl_realloc0 (void *p, unsigned int size, const char *file, int line)$/
ctags.signature: (void * p,unsigned int size,const char * file,int line)

ctags.name: rpl_realloc1
ctags.pattern: /^void * rpl_realloc1 (void *p, unsigned int size, const char *file, int line)$/
ctags.signature: (void * p,unsigned int size,const char * file,int line)

ctags.name: rpl_strdup
ctags.pattern: /^char * rpl_strdup(const char *str, const char *file, int line)$/
